member.name: T:ExxerCube.Prisma.Application.Services.OcrProcessingService
member.summary: Main OCR processing service that orchestrates the entire pipeline. Implements Railway Oriented Programming for error handling.
Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:ExxerCube.Prisma.Application.Services.OcrProcessingService.ProcessDocumentAsync(ExxerCube.Prisma.Domain.Entities.ImageData,ExxerCube.Prisma.Domain.Entities.ProcessingConfig)
member.summary: Processes a document image and extracts structured data using Railway Oriented Programming.
member.returns: A result containing the processing result or an error.

member.name: M:ExxerCube.Prisma.Application.Services.OcrProcessingService.ProcessDocumentsAsync(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{ExxerCube.Prisma.Domain.Entities.ImageData},ExxerCube.Prisma.Domain.Entities.ProcessingConfig,System.Int32)
member.summary: Processes multiple documents concurrently with proper error handling.
member.param: The list of image data to process.
member.returns: A result containing the list of processing results or an error.

member.name: M:ExxerCube.Prisma.Application.Services.OcrProcessingService.ValidateImageData(ExxerCube.Prisma.Domain.Entities.ImageData)
member.summary: Validates the image data for processing.
member.returns: A result indicating validation success or failure.

member.name: M:ExxerCube.Prisma.Application.Services.OcrProcessingService.CreateProcessingResult(ExxerCube.Prisma.Domain.Entities.ImageData,ExxerCube.Prisma.Domain.Entities.OCRResult,ExxerCube.Prisma.Domain.Entities.ExtractedFields)
member.summary: Creates a processing result from the extracted data.
